overview: Using the author's personal estate, current images of places where she lived or were dear to her, and archival images of television and film;  using parts of her prose and poetry always with first-person testimonies;  from Porto to Lisbon, from Granja to Lagos, from the Atlantic Sea to the Mediterranean, from Greece to 25 April: the passions and disappointments of a life and work dedicated to the search for the real, freedom and justice.
title: Sophia, In Her Own Words
